questionTitle: New ideas have been put into practice ___ he was elected our leader.
Our country's economy has been stable ___ the government took control of all prices.
I haven't seen him ___ a long time.
He hasn't been in jail ___ that time.
I haven't talked to him ___ last week.
He hasn't been in jail ___ more than three years.
He's been working in the field ___ early this morning.
He came back home ___ the show ended.
I haven't seen him ___ a long time ago.
They've been teaching here ___ quite a long time.
